text: Santiago Nsobeya Efuman Nchama (c. 1950 â€“ July 2020) was an Equatoguinean politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea. Between 1999 and 2003, he was Minister of Foreign Affairs. In July 2013, Nchama was named Second Vice-President of the Chamber of Deputies of the Parliament of Equatorial Guinea, alongside Francisca Tatchouop Belobe. Nchama's death was reported on 8 July 2020, aged 70.Fallece Santiago Nsobeya Efuman Nchama, Vicepresidente Primero del Congreso de Diputados de Guinea Ecuatorial ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1950 births Category:Equatoguinean people Category:African politicians
title: Santiago Nchama
